Title: AN ACT TO AMEND ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-EIGHT HUNDRED AND ONE, ENTITLED "AN ACT GRANTING TO THE IMUS ELECTRIC COMPANY, INC., A FRANCHISE TO INSTALL, OPERATE, AND MAINTAIN AN ELECTRIC LIGHT, HEAT AND POWER SYSTEM IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF BACOOR, PROVINCE OF CAVITE, PHILIPPINE ISLANDS."
Data:
[ Act No. 3891, November 16, 1931 ]
AN ACT TO AMEND ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-EIGHT HUNDRED AND ONE, ENTITLED "AN ACT GRANTING TO THE IMUS ELECTRIC COMPANY, INC., A FRANCHISE TO INSTALL, OPERATE, AND MAINTAIN AN ELECTRIC LIGHT, HEAT AND POWER SYSTEM IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF BACOOR, PROVINCE OF CAVITE, PHILIPPINE ISLANDS."
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. Act Numbered Thirty-eight hundred and one is hereby amended to read as follows:
"Section 1. Subject to the rules and conditions established in Act Numbered Thirty-six hundred and thirty-six, there is hereby granted to the Imus Electric Company, Inc., for a period of fifty years from the approval of this Act, the right, privilege and authority to construct, maintain and operate an electric light, heat and power system by means of the extension of its electric transmission lines from the municipality of Imus to the municipality of Bacoor, Province of Cavite, Philippine Islands, for distributing electric light, heat and power within the limits of said municipality of Bacoor."
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.1a—àphi1
Approved, November 16, 1931.
